default.description: The background color of primary actions in the default state.

hover.description: The background color of primary actions in the hover state.

active.description: The background color of primary actions in the active state.

default.description: The background color of secondary actions in the default state.

hover.description: The background color of secondary actions in the hover state.

active.description: The background color of secondary actions in the active state.

default.description: The background color of tertiary actions in the default state.

hover.description: The background color of tertiary actions in the hover state.

active.description: The background color of tertiary actions in the active state.

default.description: The background color of dismissal actions in the default state.

hover.description: The background color of dismissal actions in the hover state.

active.description: The background color of dismissal actions in the active state.

default.description: The background color of subtle dismissal actions, like close buttons on modals; in the default state.

hover.description: The background color of subtle dismissal actions, like close buttons on modals; in the hover state.

active.description: The background color of subtle dismissal actions, like close buttons on modals; in the active state.

default.description: The background color of danger actions in the default state.

hover.description: The background color of danger actions in the hover state.

active.description: The background color of danger actions in the active state.

orange.description: This color is used for color swatches, for eg. in the Rich Text Editor's text highlight menu.

coral.description: This color is used for color swatches, for eg. in the Rich Text Editor's text highlight menu.

pear.description: This color is used for color swatches, for eg. in the Rich Text Editor's text highlight menu.

mango.description: This color is used for color swatches, for eg. in the Rich Text Editor's text highlight menu.

raspberry.description: This color is used for color swatches, for eg. in the Rich Text Editor's text highlight menu.

azure.description: This color is used for color swatches, for eg. in the Rich Text Editor's text highlight menu.

mineral.description: This color is used for color swatches, for eg. in the Rich Text Editor's text highlight menu.

island.description: This color is used for color swatches, for eg. in the Rich Text Editor's text highlight menu.

hover.description: The background color for the hover state of options in the menu panel of the global navigation.

active_panel.description: The background color for the active-panel state of the options in the menu panel of the global navigation.

active_selected.description: The background color for the active-selected state of the options in the menu panel of the global navigation.

default.description: The background color for the default state of the navigation buttons in the return button of the global navigation.

hover.description: The background color for the hover state of the navigation buttons in the return button of the global navigation.

closed_hover.description: The background color for the closed-hover state of the navigation buttons in the menu button of the global navigation.

open_hover.description: The background color for the open-hover state of the navigation buttons in the menu button of the global navigation.

hover.description: The background color for the hover state of the navigation buttons in the new tab button of the global navigation.

selected.description: The background color for the selected state of the navigation buttons in the new tab button of the global navigation.

default.description: The default color for modals overlays.
The default background color for a page.

tonal_subtle.description: A more subtle background color for a page, ideal for highlight surfaces that are over the background, for example, a dashboard with different panels.

tonal_medium.description: The background color to highlight elements in the background, for example, the row of a table.

tonal_high.description: The background color to highlight elements in the background, for example, the alternated row of a table.

default.description: The background color for the default state of an elevated surface like modals, popovers, cards, etc.

hover.description: The background color for the hover state of an elevated surface like modals, popovers, cards, etc.

active.description: The background color for the active state of an elevated surface like modals, popovers, cards, etc.

error.description: The color of surfaces that are in an error state.

default.description: The background color for the default state of a surface that needs to pop up in pages with a lot of content, like tooltips on dashboards.

hover.description: The background color for the hover state of a surface that needs to pop up in pages with a lot of content, like tooltips on dashboards.

active.description: The background color for the active state of a surface that needs to pop up in pages with a lot of content, like tooltips on dashboards.

agent.description: This color is used as the background color of chat bubbles that come from the agent.

costumer.description: This color is used as the background color of chat bubbles that come from a costumer.

bot.description: This color is used as the background color of chat bubbles that come from a bot.

public.description: This color is used as the background color of chat bubbles that are sent to a public channel.

digital_consultation.description: This color is used as the background color of chat bubbles that come from a digital consultation.

default.description: This is the default color for text highlights in bodies of text.

transparent.description: A transparent color for general utility like fades

canvas.description: We use the canvas color for backgrounds that are meant to be used as a canvas, for example, archiect's boards.

top_left.description: This is the top left color that the ai gradient uses for container elements.

bottom_right.description: This is the bottom right color that the ai gradient uses for container elements.

top_left.description: This is the top left color that the ai gradient uses for container elements.

bottom_right.description: This is the bottom right color that the ai gradient uses for container elements.

left_side.description: The color used in the left side of the AI background gradient.

right_side.description: The color used in the right side of the AI background gradient.

active.description: The color used for the active state of the AI backgrounds.

top_left.description: This is the top left color that the ai gradient uses for borders.

middle.description: This is the middle color that the ai gradient uses for borders.

bottom_right.description: This is the bottom right color that the ai gradient uses for borders.

inverse.description: This is a background colour for brand logos

top_command_bar.description: The background color of the top command bar for the desktop global navigation.

header.description: The background color of the header bar for the mobile global navigation.

footer.description: The background color of the footer for the mobile global navigation.

tonal_medium.description: The default background color for smaller error elements like badges that need a slightly more saturated color that tonal_subtle because of their size.

tonal_high.description: The default background color for bold error elements like bold badges.

tonal_subtle.description: The default background color for error elements like alerts.

tonal_medium.description: The default background color for smaller warning elements like badges that need a slightly more saturated color that tonal_subtle because of their size.

tonal_high.description: The default background color for bold warning elements like bold badges.

tonal_subtle.description: The default background color for warning elements like alerts.

tonal_medium.description: The default background color for smaller success elements like badges that need a slightly more saturated color that tonal_subtle because of their size.

tonal_high.description: The default background color for bold success elements like bold badges.

tonal_subtle.description: The default background color for success elements like alerts.

tonal_medium.description: The default background color for smaller info elements like badges that need a slightly more saturated color that tonal_subtle because of their size.

tonal_high.description: The default background color for bold info elements like bold badges.

tonal_subtle.description: The default background color for info elements like alerts.

tonal_medium.description: Although this tokens has the same value as tonal_subtle, it is needed to match the structure of the other statuses.

tonal_high.description: Although this tokens has no current use, it is needed to match the structure of the other statuses.

tonal_subtle.description: The default background color for neutral feedback elements like alerts.

default.description: The color to indicate that this progress has not been achieved.

progressed.description: The color to indicate that this progress in a component.

track.description: The color used for the tracks of click-based components,like the container of the toggle or the track of the slider.
The default background color for inputs.

first_level.description: The color of the highlight of the text that matches a search query on a first level.

subsequent_level.description: The color of the highlight of the text that matches a search query on a subsequent level.

default.description: The color for foreground elements that are over a primary/default background.

active.description: The color for foreground elements that are over a primary/hover background.

hover.description: The color for foreground elements that are over a primary/active background.

default.description: The color for foreground elements that are over a secondary/default background.

active.description: The active color of links.

visited.description: The  color of links when  they were already visited.

default.description: this is used to the selected indicator for the data table headers
The foreground color for the default state of the navigation buttons in the menu panel level 1 of the global navigation.

hover.description: The foreground color for the hover state of the navigation buttons in the menu panel level 1 of the global navigation.

active_panel.description: The background color for the active-panel state of the navigation buttons in the menu panel level 1 of the global navigation.

active_selected.description: The foreground color for the active-selected state of the navigation buttons in the menu panel level 1 of the global navigation.

disabled.description: The foreground color for the disabled state of the navigation buttons in the menu panel level 1 of the global navigation.

hover.description: The foreground color for the hover state of the navigation buttons in the menu panel level 2 of the global navigation.

selected.description: The foreground color for the selected state of the navigation buttons in the menu panel level 2 of the global navigation.

disabled.description: The foreground color for the disabled state of the navigation buttons in the menu panel level 2 of the global navigation.

default.description: The foreground color for the default state of the new tab button of the global navigation.

hover.description: The foreground color for the hover state of the new tab button of the global navigation.

selected.description: The foreground color for the selected state of the new tab button of the global navigation.

default.description: The foreground color for the default state of the return button of the global navigation.

hover.description: The foreground color for the hover state of the return button of the global navigation.

high_emphasis.description: The default color for high emphasis content on surfaces, like headings, subheadings, quotes or bold text.

mid_emphasis.description: The default color for medium emphasis content on surfaces, like normal paragraphs.

low_emphasis.description: The default color for low emphasis content on surfaces, like captions or fine print.

high_emphasis.description: The default color for high emphasis content on high contrast surfaces, like headings, subheadings, quotes or bold text.

mid_emphasis.description: The default color for medium emphasis content on high contrast surfaces, like normal paragraphs.

low_emphasis.description: The default color for low emphasis content on high contrast surfaces, like captions or fine print.

ai.description: The color for foreground content used to highlight an AI feature on a surface.

brand.description: The brand color, mostly used for logos on surfaces.

brand_inverse.description: The brand color foreground for inverse logos

top_left.description: This is the top left color that the ai gradient uses for icons and text

bottom_right.description: This is the bottom right color that the ai gradient uses for icons and text

brand_secondary.description: The complimentary brand color, mostly used for text that accompany logos.

global_nav.description: Accent color, mostly used for accents in the Global Navigation such as current page

light.description: The recommended color for contetn that is on a custom accent background that doesn't pass the contrast check with the dark color.

dark.description: The recommended color for contetn that is on a custom accent background that doesn't pass the contrast check with the light color.

default.description: The color for foreground content on progress_and_loading/default backgrounds.

progressed.description: The color for foreground content on progress_and_loading/progressed backgrounds.

completed.description: The color for foreground content on progress_and_loading/completed foreground

incompleted.description: The color for foreground content on progress_and_loading/incompleted foreground

high_emphasis.description: The default color for high emphasis content on info backgrounds, like headings, subheadings, quotes or bold text or links.

accent.description: The color for content on info backgrounds that we want to highlight, like the info icon on an alert.

high_emphasis.description: The default color for high emphasis content on success backgrounds, like headings, subheadings, quotes or bold text or links.

accent.description: The color for content on success backgrounds that we want to highlight, like the info icon on an alert.

high_emphasis.description: The default color for high emphasis content on warning backgrounds, like headings, subheadings, quotes or bold text or links.

high_emphasis_inverse.description: The default color for high emphasis content on bold warning backgrounds, like the label of a badge.

accent.description: The color for content on warning backgrounds that we want to highlight, like the info icon on an alert.

high_emphasis.description: The default color for high emphasis content on error backgrounds, like headings, subheadings, quotes or bold text or links.

accent.description: The color for content on error backgrounds that we want to highlight, like the info icon on an alert.

default.description: The color for foreground content on progress_and_loading/default backgrounds.

positive.description: We use this color for indicating a positive, like, a positive trend in a chart, a positive review, etc.

negative.description: We use this color for indicating a negative, like, a negative trend in a chart, a negative review, a reduction, etc.

neutral.description: We use this color for indicating a neutral trend, like, a neutral trend in a chart.

default.description: The color we used for the default helper text.

error.description: The color we used for the error helper text.

placeholder.description: The default color of placeholder content on an input.

populated.description: The default color of populated content on an input.

icon.description: The default color of icons on an input.

enabled.description: The color we use for foreground elements on click-based inputs when they are enabled but not selected.

selected.description: The color we use for foreground elements on click-based inputs when they are selected.

hover.description: The color we use for foreground elements on click-based inputs when they are on the hover state.

active.description: The color we use for foreground elements on click-based inputs when they are on the active state.

default.description: The color for the content of input labels.

required_accent.description: The color we used for the required indicator.

optional_accent.description: The color we used for optional indicator in labels

tooltip.description: The color we used for tooltip in labels

matching_text.description: The color for text that matches a search query.

focus.description: The color we use for focus outlines.

divider.description: The default color for dividers inside surfaces.

default.description: The default color for the edge borders of surfaces, we mostly use it to add some elevation for cards.

hover.description: The color for the edge borders of surfaces that are on the hover state, like the bottom border of a tab.

error.description: The color for the edge borders of surfaces that are on the error state, like the border of a card in an error state.

enabled.description: The color for the edge borders of high contrast surfaces that are enabled, like the bottom border of a selected tab.

active.description: The color for the edge borders of surfaces that are on the active state, like the bottom border of a tab.

high_emphasis.description: The default color for the edge borders of high-emphasis surfaces e.g dark tooltip

default.description: This is used for default border for datatables
The default color for the edge borders of high contrast surfaces.

enabled.description: The color for the edge borders of high contrast surfaces that are enabled.

hover.description: The color for the edge borders of high contrast surfaces that are on the hover state.

active.description: The color for the edge borders of high contrast surfaces that are on the active state.

top_left.description: This is the top left color that the ai gradient uses for borders.

bottom_right.description: This is the bottom right color that the ai gradient uses for borders.

middle.description: This is the middle color that the ai gradient uses for borders.

bar.description: The border color on the left of tree view of the global navigation.

divider.description: The border color at the bottom of the top command bar of the global navigation.
The border color at the right of the panel of the global navigation.

closed_hover.description: The border color for the closed-hover state of the menu button of the global navigation.

info.description: The default borders for elements that have a feedback/info background.

warning.description: The default borders for elements that have a feedback/warning background.

success.description: The default borders for elements that have a feedback/success background.

error.description: The default borders for elements that have a feedback/error background.

primary.description: The default borders for elements that have a feedback/primary background.

divider.description: The color for dividers inside interactive/primary  elements.
The color for dividers inside interactive/secondary elements.
The color for dividers inside interactive/tertiary elements.
The color for dividers inside interactive/danger elements.

default.description: The border for inputs edges in the default state.

hover.description: The border for inputs edges in the hover state.

active.description: The border for inputs edges in the active state.

error.description: The border for inputs edges in the error state.

high_emphasis_inverse.description: We use this color for labels that don't pass the contrast check with the default high_emphasis color on heatmaps tiles.
